posts.post_title: FS: T205 Gold Border Hal Chase (Cycle back)
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a SGC 10 T205 Gold Border Hal Chase with Cycle reverse.  Tough card to come by. $60 delivered, PP F&F preferred.  PM if interested, thanks for looking.
